name: docxtemplater
author: Edgar Hipp
description: .docx generator working with templates and data (like Mustache)

scripts.compile: rm js -r; gulp allCoffee && node examples/compile_site.js
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify:test && npm run browserify:lib
scripts.convertto:es6: mkdir -p es6; for i in coffee/*.coffee; do echo "$i"; decaffeinate "$i"; mv "${i%.coffee}.js" "${i%.coffee}.es6"; done; for i in coffee/*.es6; do mv "$i" "es6${i#coffee}"; done
scripts.convertto:es5: rm js -rf ; mkdir -p test/spec; mkdir -p js; babel es6 --out-dir js; mv js/docxgenTest.js test/spec/docxgenTest.spec.js
